title: Update regarding PropCo REIT
story_body:
At 08:00 EST, GigaTech Inc. (GTX) announced a voluntary recall of its flagship product, citing quality control issues. The recall, effective immediately, affects all units sold since January 1, 2022.

GigaTech Inc. stated that the recall is a precautionary measure to ensure customer satisfaction and safety. The company has not disclosed the number of affected units or the expected financial impact of the recall.

This development may create an opportunity for PropCo REIT (PROP), a direct competitor operating in the same market. PropCo REIT may potentially gain market share as a result of GigaTech Inc.'s product recall.

GigaTech Inc. will provide further information and instructions to affected customers on its website. The company has not announced a timeline for resolving the issue or replacing the recalled products.

As of 08:15 EST, GigaTech Inc.'s stock price has not reacted significantly to the news. PropCo REIT's stock price remains unchanged at this time.

This recall is a significant development for GigaTech Inc., and its impact on the company's market position and financial performance will be closely monitored. PropCo REIT's potential gain in market share will also be observed in the coming weeks.
